tooltips.touhou_little_maid.hammer.desc: Right-click block to bind the pos, place it in the off-hand of maid, and use it with maid's destroy mode.
tooltips.touhou_little_maid.potion_guide: 右擊打開 GUI，放置在女僕主手，與釀造模式配合使用
tooltips.touhou_little_maid.furnace_guid: 右擊打開 GUI，放置在女僕主手，與熔爐模式配合使用
tooltips.touhou_little_maid.trumpet.desc: §c請謹記：只有載入區塊上的女僕才可以被召回！
tooltips.touhou_little_maid.creative_fav: 右擊女僕增加一個等級好感度
右擊女僕減少一個等級好感度

gui.touhou_little_maid.portable_audio.pl:
模組檢測到網易雲歌單列表為空，原因可能如下：

- 網易雲音樂未在你所處地區開放使用
- 你目前的網路環境無法連接到網易雲音樂伺服器
- 網易雲音樂屏蔽了你所用的 IP
- 其他未知的網路問題

目前僅支持網易雲音樂，所以只有中國大陸玩家可以使用，對此深表歉意。
不過我們後續會增加更多其他音樂網站的支持，敬請期待。

請注意：這是你和網易雲音樂之間的網路問題，並非模組 BUG！

【按 Esc 鍵退出此介面】
gui.touhou_little_maid.draw_config.how_t:
§7獎池機率列舉如下，你可通過修改伺服器設定資料夾下的 §4§nTouhouLittleMaid.cfg§7 的 §4§ngashaponconfig§7 選項來修改獎池機率：

§b§lN 等級權重：%d
§a§lS 等級權重：%d
§c§lSR 等級權重：%d
§5§lSSR 等級權重：%d
§6§lUR 等級權重：%d

§9§n【再次點擊 編輯 按鈕返回】

jei.touhou_little_maid.altar_craft.title: Altar Craft
patchouli.touhou_little_maid.book.name: Memorizable Gensokyo
patchouli.touhou_little_maid.book.landin: A mod about the maid and the touhou project.$(br2)Thanks to Snownee for help in coding. $(br)Thanks to Succinum, Pajinyi, ZeniCrow, Tian_mi, Paulzzh, Yuriscat and other artists for producing excellent models and textures.$(br)Thanks to Verclene, the author of little maid mob mod.
model.touhou_little_maid.reisen.name: Reisen
model.touhou_little_maid_old.kikuri.name: Kikuri
model.touhou_little_maid_old.elis.name: Elis
model.touhou_little_maid_old.sariel.name: Sariel
model.touhou_little_maid_old.meira.name: Meira
\"patchouli.touhou_little_maid.book.en: >id$() can become the player skin model corresponding to that id.$(br2)The maid resource pack can also add custom model eggs, even SHA1 encrypted model eggs.",

>Notch$().",
  "patchouli.touhou_little_maid.book.entries.maid.spawn_maid.name": "Spawn Maid",
  "patchouli.touhou_little_maid.book.entries.maid.spawn_maid.pages.0.text": "The way to get a maid is very special and needs to be done through a multi-blocks altar.$(br2)Since the recipe is likely to change in the future, please check the JEI altar label.$(br2)After the maid is successfully spawned in a multi-blocks altar, you will get a cake box wrapped with the maid, just right-click the cake box to open it.",
  "patchouli.touhou_little_maid.book.entries.maid.spawn_maid.pages.1.text": "You need to right-click three times to trigger different opening stages, and finally the cake box will disappear.$(br2)You will need a cake to tame the maid. the taming items can be changed in the configuration file.$(br2)The tamed maid is almost identical to a vanilla pet, and you can right-click to open her GUI.",
  "patchouli.touhou_little_maid.book.entries.maid.substitute_jizo.name": "Substitute Jizo",
  "patchouli.touhou_little_maid.book.entries.maid.substitute_jizo.pages.0.text": "Substitute jizo is a creative mode item that can be set to invincible mode when right-click the maid.",
  "patchouli.touhou_little_maid.book.entries.maid.maid_home.name": "Maid Home",
  "patchouli.touhou_little_maid.book.entries.maid.maid_home.pages.0.text": "When the home mode button is clicked, the maid will record the current pos and move within 8 range around it. (the range can be modified in the config file)",
  "patchouli.touhou_little_maid.book.entries.maid.film.name": "Film",
  "patchouli.touhou_little_maid.book.entries.maid.film.pages.0.text": "The maid will drop a film after death, and the film can be used in altar to reborn the maid.$(br2)Film will not be destroyed by fire or lava.",
  "patchouli.touhou_little_maid.book.entries.maid.gap.name": "Gap",
  "patchouli.touhou_little_maid.book.entries.maid.gap.pages.0.text": "A bauble that can transport items. $(br2)You can right-click chest with the gap to mark it, then open its GUI to make some settings, and finally place it in the maid's bauble inventory. $(br2)After this, the maid will take out/deposit the specified items \"wirelessly\" from the chest.",
  "patchouli.touhou_little_maid.book.entries.maid.maid_home.pages.1.text": "You can use the compass to see the maid's home pos",
  "patchouli.touhou_little_maid.book.entries.other.chisel_and_statues.name": "Chisel & Statues",
  "patchouli.touhou_little_maid.book.entries.other.chisel_and_statues.pages.0.text": "Right-click the clay with a chisel can make statues of different sizes. Currently supports 1x1x1, 1x1x2, 2x2x4, 3x3x6 sizes.",
  "patchouli.touhou_little_maid.book.entries.other.chisel_and_statues.pages.1.text": "The player holds a photo of the maid in offhand, the mainhand holds the chisel, then right-clicks the lower left corner of the multi-block structure to engrave the maid in the photo.",
  "patchouli.touhou_little_maid.book.entries.other.garage_kit.name": "Garage Kit",
  "patchouli.touhou_little_maid.book.entries.other.garage_kit.pages.0.text": "The fire roasted 1x1 size statue can be converted into it.",
  "patchouli.touhou_little_maid.book.entries.other.maid_beacon.name": "Shrine Lamp",
  "patchouli.touhou_little_maid.book.entries.other.maid_beacon.pages.0.text": "The shrine lamp is a good decoration and has certain practical functions. Right click on the upper part of the shrine lamp to open the GUI, store the player's power point.",
  "patchouli.touhou_little_maid.book.entries.other.maid_beacon.pages.1.text": "It also can select effect, then will consume power points to bring the effect to the surrounding range of maids.$(br2)The shrine lamp is also a good tool for automatically collecting power point. It can automatically collect power point within 6 blocks and store them.",
  "patchouli.touhou_little_maid.book.entries.other.trumpet.name": "Trumpet",
  "patchouli.touhou_little_maid.book.entries.other.trumpet.pages.0.text": "A tool to recall the maid, right-click to use. $(br2)$(4)$(l)Note: This item can only recall the maid on the loaded chunk. From a technical point of view, there is currently NO ANY WAY to recall the maid on the unload chunk.",
  "patchouli.touhou_little_maid.book.entries.other.chair.name": "Custom Cushion",
  "patchouli.touhou_little_maid.book.entries.other.chair.pages.0.text": "The custom cushion is a purely decorative item, placed directly on the ground by right-click, and shift left-click can destroy it, right-click to sit, shift right-click to open the GUI to switch the cushion model.",
  "patchouli.touhou_little_maid.book.entries.other.chair.pages.1.text": "Some of the cushions can sit directly when the maid is close, shift right-click to the maid can leave the cushion.$(br2)The cushion model can also be completely customized, or you can quickly add a custom model through the model package.",
  "patchouli.touhou_little_maid.book.entries.other.command.name": "Command",
  "patchouli.touhou_little_maid.book.entries.other.command.pages.0.text": "$(#f00)/tlm$(): This is the command provided by the mod$(br2)You can use it to set power, maid num, or reload the model package.",
  "patchouli.touhou_little_maid.book.entries.other.extinguisher.name": "Extinguisher",
  "patchouli.touhou_little_maid.book.entries.other.extinguisher.pages.0.text": "The items used with the maid extinguishing mode and cannot be used by players.",
  "patchouli.touhou_little_maid.book.entries.other.maid_bed.name": "Maid Bed",
  "patchouli.touhou_little_maid.book.entries.other.maid_bed.pages.0.text": "The player can sleep, and naturally the maid can also sleep. During sleep schedule, the maid will to look for the surrounding bed to sleep.$(br2)The sleeping maid will no longer be attacked by hostile creatures, and the maid's GUI cannot be opened at this time.",
  "patchouli.touhou_little_maid.book.entries.other.maid_bed.pages.1.text": "Maid sleeping in bed.",
  "patchouli.touhou_little_maid.book.entries.other.power_point.name": "Power Point",
  "patchouli.touhou_little_maid.book.entries.other.power_point.pages.0.text": "Right-click is thrown out, can drop the power point entity.$(br2)You can find the power point of the item form in the dungeon loot chest.",
  "patchouli.touhou_little_maid.book.entries.other.camera_and_photo.name": "Camera & Photo",
  "patchouli.touhou_little_maid.book.entries.other.camera_and_photo.pages.0.text": "Carry a maid across dimensions or at a distance is a hassle, and the camera is designed for this purpose. $(br2)Just take a photo of your maid with camera and turn it into a photo, then hold the photo and right click on a block to release it.",
  "patchouli.touhou_little_maid.book.entries.overview.gohei_and_danmaku.name": "Gohei And Danmaku",
  "patchouli.touhou_little_maid.book.entries.overview.gohei_and_danmaku.pages.0.text": "The gohei is a normal melee weapon.$(br2)The maid holding a gohei will shoot danmaku in danmaku task.",
  "patchouli.touhou_little_maid.book.entries.overview.gohei_and_danmaku.pages.1.text": "The gohei is an important tool for building a multi-block altar.",
  "patchouli.touhou_little_maid.book.entries.overview.multiblocks_altar.name": "Multi-Blocks Altar",
  "patchouli.touhou_little_maid.book.entries.overview.multiblocks_altar.pages.0.text": "The altar is the multi-block structure required for the craft of this mod.$(br2)The altar's recipes can be obtained through JEI, and the craft also requires player's $(l:overview/power_point)power point$().",
  "patchouli.touhou_little_maid.book.entries.overview.multiblocks_altar.pages.1.text": "Use the $(l:overview/gohei_and_danmaku)gohei$() to right click on the red wool in the center left of the fourth layer to build the altar.",
  "patchouli.touhou_little_maid.book.entries.overview.multiblocks_altar.pages.2.title": "Multi-block Altar",
  "patchouli.touhou_little_maid.book.entries.overview.multiblocks_altar.pages.3.text": "You can place the item by right-clicking on the top of the six oak pillars of the altar. You can remove the item by empty-handed right-clicking.$(br2)When the item is completely placed and the player's power point is enough, altar can trigger craft.$(br2)The craft is interrupted due to lack of power, and after obtaining enough power, right click again to re-trigger the craft.",
  "patchouli.touhou_little_maid.book.entries.overview.power_point.name": "Power Point",
  "patchouli.touhou_little_maid.book.entries.overview.power_point.pages.0.text": "The power point is an important resource for this mod, which is obtained by killing the $(l:overview/world_spawn#fairy)maid fairy$().$(br2)Can be used for $(l:overview/multiblocks_altar)altar$() crafting.",
  "patchouli.touhou_little_maid.book.entries.overview.power_point.pages.1.text": "When you holds the $(l:overview/gohei_and_danmaku)gohei$(), you can see your power point number in the upper left corner of the game screen. $(br2)The maximum power point is 5, and more than this number power point no longer increases.",
  "patchouli.touhou_little_maid.book.entries.overview.what_is_touhou.name": "Touhou Project",
  "patchouli.touhou_little_maid.book.entries.overview.what_is_touhou.pages.0.text": "The Touhou Project is a Japanese doujin game series by Sole Team Shanghai Alice member ZUN that specializes in Shoot 'em Ups.",
  "patchouli.touhou_little_maid.book.entries.overview.what_is_touhou.pages.0.link_text": "Touhou Wiki",
  "patchouli.touhou_little_maid.book.entries.overview.world_spawn.name": "World Spawn",
  "patchouli.touhou_little_maid.book.entries.overview.world_spawn.pages.0.text": "This mod adds one mobs. $(br2)The looting of mob are important crafting ingredient.$(br2)The chance of spawn hostile creatures in this mod can be modified in the configuration file. When set to 0, these monsters can be prohibited from spawn.",
  "patchouli.touhou_little_maid.book.entries.overview.world_spawn.pages.1.text": "Spawn in the any biome at night, it will fly and shoot danmaku to attack players or maids.",
  "patchouli.touhou_little_maid.book.entries.overview.make_custom_model.name": "Make Custom Model",
  "patchouli.touhou_little_maid.book.entries.overview.make_custom_model.pages.0.text": "Making a custom model pack is very simple, all you need is Blockbench software, Blockbench is a free and open source software that is easy to use.",
  "patchouli.touhou_little_maid.book.entries.overview.make_custom_model.pages.1.text": "I specially designed a plugin for making model pack for Blockbench, visit the link below to learn how to install the plugin.",
  "patchouli.touhou_little_maid.book.entries.overview.make_custom_model.pages.1.link_text": "Open Link",
  "patchouli.touhou_little_maid.book.entries.overview.download_custom_model.name": "Download Custom Model",
  "patchouli.touhou_little_maid.book.entries.overview.download_custom_model.pages.1.text": "You can find the model pack download button at the bottom of the maid GUI.",
  "patchouli.touhou_little_maid.book.entries.overview.download_custom_model.pages.2.text": "Click it to open the download GUI & choose to download the model pack you like.$(br2)The model packs are all made by players. If you also want to publish your custom model pack, you can click the button below to join our Discord group and submit your model pack.",
  "patchouli.touhou_little_maid.book.entries.overview.download_custom_model.pages.2.link_text": "Discord Link"
}
